column3: EVA Page: Global Program Management enables Global Program Teams (GPTs) and the wider organization to develop new medicines with a sense of urgency, investment optimization and result orientation by leveraging state-of-the-art agile program management that drives strategy optionality and execution and embodies inclusion with a winning team spirit so that we unleash the full potential of drug hunting teams to maximize the pipeline value.
column7: Highly knowledgeable & comfortable discussing the rationale of decisions made per functional unit

column3: Drive the execution of early to late-stage clinical development programs aligned with the global development strategy, ensuring the ethical and scientific integrity of product development activities.
column5: Supporting the execution of clinical development programs by providing scientific expertise and ensuring the integrity of clinical data. This position involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and analyze clinical trials, contributing to the development of innovative medicines while adhering to regulatory and ethical standards within the framework of the company's strategic objectives.
column7: Experience in developing strategy and execution of clinical trials for new drugs or therapies in human subjects from early to late stage. Includes evaluate the safety, efficacy, and overall effectiveness of a medication prior to approved for public use.

column3: Drive the execution of early to late-stage clinical development programs aligned with the global development strategy, ensuring the ethical and scientific integrity of product development activities.
column5: Supporting the execution of clinical development programs by providing scientific expertise and ensuring the integrity of clinical data. This position involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and analyze clinical trials, contributing to the development of innovative medicines while adhering to regulatory and ethical standards within the framework of the company's strategic objectives.
column7: Understanding of Desease mechanism and therapeutic area (in the fields of e.g. Oncology, N&I, CM&E,  Fertility etc.)

column3: Drive the execution of early to late-stage clinical development programs aligned with the global development strategy, ensuring the ethical and scientific integrity of product development activities.
column5: Supporting the execution of clinical development programs by providing scientific expertise and ensuring the integrity of clinical data. This position involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and analyze clinical trials, contributing to the development of innovative medicines while adhering to regulatory and ethical standards within the framework of the company's strategic objectives.
column7: Ability to do independent clinical analysis and assessments for Business development cases, new molecules, new products, data and to derive maningful conclusions regarding the viability and strategic direction of new products within the pharmaceutical industry.

column7: Ability to effectively convey complex scientific and clinical data to various stakeholders, while also analyzing and interpreting that data to inform decision-making and strategy within clinical development processes.

column3: Drive the execution of early to late-stage clinical development programs aligned with the global development strategy, ensuring the ethical and scientific integrity of product development activities.
column5: Driving the global development strategy and execution of early to late-stage development programs across the company portfolio to bring innovative medicines to patients in Japan. To provide and ensure ethical and scientific contributions to product development activities in Japan. Contribute as a member of local R&D LT to deliver on “Biopharma Japan 5 Year Strategy” to ensure its growth as a specialty care innovator in Japan through working collaboratively with other functions.
